name: Zalo Personal (Free)
description: Free Zalo Personal channel plugin using zca-js library
author: OpenClaw Community

sessionPath.description: Path to store session credentials (defaults to ~/.openclaw/zalouser-free/)

accounts.description: Map of account ID to account configuration

enabled.description: Enable this account on gateway startup

dmAccess.description: DM access control: 'open' (anyone) or 'whitelist' (only allowed users)

groupAccess.description: Group access: 'open' (anyone), 'mention' (only when mentioned), or 'whitelist' (only allowed users)

allowedUsers.description: List of allowed user IDs (for whitelist modes)

allowedGroups.description: List of allowed group IDs (for whitelist modes)

accounts.label: Accounts
accounts.description: Configure multiple Zalo accounts. Use 'openclaw zalouser-free login <accountId>' to authenticate each account.
